title: Increase Karthus Auto Attack Range  (PLZ RITO)
body:
His attack range is disturbingly low and there's really no reason for that. Maybe back in the day when Karthus was among the OP picks, fine, but today he's been powercreeped to hell and really doesn't need a strangely low attack range like that (for his class).


Similar mages:

Anivia: 600 Range
Swain: 550 Range
Cass: 550 Range
Ryze: 550 Range

Basically every other mage: 550+ Range

Karthus: 450 Range ??


Please consider changing it to 550


This will help last hit and harass with autos better.


Also you nerfed mana so now we have to auto more as well.
